text: If I could go back in time and explain to my exes why they had so much trouble understanding me I would say that I was just beginning to learn that there are women who are nothing like my mother. So please be patient with me. I meant well. And btw, I'd suggest that perhaps they have me confused with the men they grew up around and to consider the possibility I'm not "just like them." (An accusation I've heard many many times.)
